sys_hub_action_instance.comment: to whom the record was assigned to
Look up Event sys_ID registered in the "Event" table
to the caller informing the registration was rejected

sys_element_mapping.value:
Olá  1 - Update Record➛...➛Full Name,

Infelizmente a sua incriçõo para o evento1 - Update Record➛...➛Name não foi concluida.

Best regards,
Equipe Event Management

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Once it was approved, subtract "1" seat from the total Event's available seats.
Wait until someone is assigned to
to the caller informing the registration was approved

sys_element_mapping.value:
Olá  1 - Update Record➛...➛Full Name,

sua incriçõo para o evento1 - Update Record➛...➛Name está confirmada.

Nos vemos no dia 1 - Update Record➛...➛Start Date.

Best regards,
Equipe Event Management
